trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Grand Rapids Charter Township
There were no other sightings in Grand Rapids Charter Township on or around September 30th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmy wife called on her way home from work describing a line of lights in the sky near our home. i went outside in my pjs and observed one light through the trees. i waited for my son to get in the car, we pulled out, waiting for a passing car, and drove 6 blocks towards the light which traveled very slowly perpendicular in a true north and south direction. just slightly off from the n\s street grid. it only managed to move about 2 blocks to our left while we moved 6 towards, and 2 over. it them seemed to be behind us and passing over as i snapped some pics with my iphone. my son and i observed it and as i switched the phone to camera mode the light disappeared. a few minutes later we could see a jet take off from a distant international airport. i'd have to say that the upf was about a mile higher than the plane and appearing almost as large in the sky. the light was really deceiving. as if it was only as high as a sky scraper, and at the same time miles high like the bombers i'd watch take off in az.
